biography: Olli, a formidable presence from Hirsala Golf, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his steely focus and an uncanny ability to read the course, Olli is a tough competitor.

With eight past appearances, Olli's deep understanding of the nuances of the tournament is evident. He has secured one victory in the Hector Trophée, as well as one Victor trophy. His strategic prowess and ability to perform under pressure make him a player to watch.

Off the course, Olli is known for his calm demeanor and sportsmanship, but make no mistake - when it's time to compete, Olli is all business. The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Olli's ninth appearance, and he undoubtedly has his sights set on another strong performance.
